attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The royal family and their associated hangers-on should be removed from their positions in society and 'their' assets should be liquidated, with the money raised going into public coffers. They are an anachronistic, parasitical institution who should have no place in a modern, democratic Britain. A democratically elected head of state would be able to replace them as a figurehead at a fraction of the cost to the tax payer.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
